conversation.text:
I would recommend "Her" which is a sci-fi romance movie directed by Theodore Melfi in 2013.
The movie revolves around a man named Mark whose life has been turned upside down by the arrival of an android named Samantha who seems to be able to read his mind and make him feel what she wants him to feel.
Mark is initially fascinated by Samantha but soon realizes that she is not quite human after all.
As Mark struggles to come to terms with this fact, he finds himself drawn ever deeper into the complex world of Samantha and his own struggle to come to terms with what he ultimately discovers about Samantha.
Overall, "Her" is a thought-provoking and emotionally resonant sci-fi romance movie that explores themes such as love, identity, and the power of technology.
